挨.definition: to suffer; to endure; to pull through (hard times); to delay; to stall; to play for time; to dawdle

挨不上.definition: to be irrelevant; to be superfluous

挨個兒.definition: erhua variant of 挨個|挨个[ai1 ge4]

挨凍受餓.definition: see 挨餓受凍|挨饿受冻[ai2e4-shou4dong4]

挨剋.definition: to be rebuked; to suffer blows

挨家.definition: from house to house, one by one

挨家挨戶.definition: to go from house to house

挨延.definition: to delay; to procrastinate; to play for time

挨戶.definition: from house to house, one by one

挨戶挨家.definition: see 挨家挨戶|挨家挨户[ai1 jia1 ai1 hu4]

挨打.definition: to take a beating; to get thrashed; to come under attack

挨打受罵.definition: to suffer beatings and receive abuse (idiom)

挨批.definition: to be criticized; to suffer blame

挨揍.definition: to be beaten; to take a drubbing; buffeted; knocked about

挨擠.definition: to crowd together; to jostle; squeezed

挨擦.definition: to press against; to nuzzle up to

挨整.definition: to be the target of an attack

挨時間.definition: to stall; to play for time

挨板子.definition: to suffer beating; fig. to be severely criticized; to take a hammering

挨次.definition: in sequence; in the proper order; one by one; in turn

挨罰.definition: to be punished; to be fined

挨肩兒.definition: in rapid succession (of children, close in age); shoulder-to-shoulder

挨近.definition: to approach; to get close to; to sneak up on; near to

挨邊.definition: to keep close to the edge; near the mark; close to (the true figure); relevant (used with negative to mean totally irrelevant)

挨邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 挨邊|挨边[ai1 bian1]

挨門.definition: from door to door, one by one

挨門挨戶.definition: see 挨家挨戶|挨家挨户[ai1 jia1 ai1 hu4]

挨頭子.definition: to be criticized; to suffer blame

挨餓.definition: to go hungry; to endure starvation; famished
